text: Mulberry Creek is a stream in Bates County in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary of the Marais des Cygnes River. Mulberry Creek owes its name to the abundant mulberry along its course. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Bates County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Mulberry Creek (Marais des Cygnes River tributary)
